reviewText: If your a train enthusiast, don't miss this one.
i love big train and the history of them
I am a railfan...........'Nuff said. This is outstanding (shipment was quick,too..........must have been shipped by rail !!!)
My son is still watching these years later!

Being a model railroader in N-Scale as well as a steam fan, this video held my interest every second.
Super great film footage of those giants of steam, living breathing monsters of the rails from the best days in railroading ever.
I highly recommend this video for anybody that loves steamers.
Bought it for my Grandpa, he loved it!
